Skip To main content View Prices See all photos Holiday Inn Charleston-Riverview DINING 
Discover the Harborview Restaurant and Lounge located on the top floor of the 14-story round Holiday Inn Charleston-Riverview hotel. Elevate your culinary journey to new heights and immerse yourself in the heart and soul of Lowcountry American cuisine.

The highlights

The highlights

Harborview Restaurant and Lounge

Harborview Restaurant and Lounge

Experience the breakfast buffet at Harborview Restaurant and Lounge, situated on the 14th floor of our hotel. Enjoy the delectable American cuisine and skillfully mixed cocktails while admiring the breathtaking views of Charleston Harbor, Downtown Charleston, and the serene Ashley River.

Harborview Restaurant

american
Cuisine: 
Top Floor of the Hotel
Location: 
1-843-5567100
Restaurant phone: 
Breakfast is served daily from 6:30am to 10am. Dinner hours are Sunday to Thursday 5pm to 9pm and Friday to Saturday from 5pm to 10pm. Sunday Brunch is served every Sunday 11:30am to 2pm. Come indulge in a dining experience like no other while enjoying captivating panoramic views of the Charleston skyline.

Our cocktail lounge offers specialty cocktails, beer, and wine. Unwind with large flat screen TVs that offer a perfect blend of entertainment and relaxation. Watch the game, catch up on the latest news, or simply revel in the company of friends old and new. Hours are Sunday to Thursday 3:30pm to 9pm and Friday to Saturday from 3:30pm to 10pm.

The Harborview Lounge is located on the top floor of the hotel and has spectacular panoramic views of the city of Charleston.
